main event: A witness reported seeing a whitish silver object hovering and moving rapidly in Richardson, Texas on April 18, 1965.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be 40 to 50 feet in length and at an altitude of about one thousand feet., The object was observed to hover for a few seconds before dropping and accelerating quickly., Various other people also reported seeing the object with similar descriptions., The witness believes it was not a conventional man-made object., The object took about ten seconds to appear and disappear from sight.
witness description: two individuals standing in a front yard
